item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Monday, October 14, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Self-referential variable initialization in C (19 points | 10 comments)

8. The optimised version of 7-Zip can't be built from source (24 points | 26 comments)

11. The greatness and limitations of the js-framework-benchmark (5 points | no comments)

14. Building the hundred-year web service with htmx (2 points | no comments)

21. how not to run a sAAs company (2 points | 1 comment)

25. ACF 6.3.8 Security Release (7 points | 2 comments)
